observation: GAUSS Software - Fastest Platform for Data Analytics | Aptech  Menu Products Industry Solution Support Where to buy Resources Blog Contact Us GAUSS Platform GAUSS Applications GAUSS Engine Third Party Applications Econometrics Social Science Epidemiology Finance Engineering/Physics GAUSS in Education Tutorials User Forum Manuals White Papers Product Flyers GAUSS Knowledge Base Icon THE WORLD NEEDS YOUR RESEARCH! WE WANT TO HELP Start FREE trial Request pricing Used in 100's 500 GAUSS 24 NOW AVAILABLE Discover how GAUSS 24 can help you accomplish more! See all the new features WHAT WE OFFER An easy-to-use data analysis and visualization environment based on the powerful, fast and efficient GAUSS Matrix Programming Language. Explore GAUSS Prototype to production: Embed custom GAUSS analytics directly in enterprise or web-applications. Explore the Engine Customizable programs that extend the GAUSS platform in the fields of econometrics, finance, risk analysis, statistics and more. Explore the Modules For Modern Research No Platform Delivers Like Code the way you think You can code ideas and techniques straight from the latest journals in GAUSS as quickly as you can with a pen and paper. The GAUSS matrix language is the most natural way to bring cutting edge math, statistics and machine learning to life. Craft the Perfect Visual Custom tailor compelling data stories, interactively or programmatically. Smart Compiler + Efficient Code + Parallelization = Faster Analytics GAUSS is the product of more than three decades of innovation and refinement of efficient, native code. This combined with our optimizing compiler and modern threading capabilities, allows you to get your answers before the competition. Library of Ready-Made Solutions GAUSS Application Modules provide pre-built solutions for many types of analysis, including Bayesian estimation constrained optimization Integrate Into Almost Any Environment Efficiently connect powerful analytics to any internal or customer facing data source, application, or interface with the GAUSS Engine. Free Software for Students Find out how our GAUSS in the Classroom program helps students and professors. Learn more Step-by-step, informative lessons for those who want to dive into GAUSS and achieve their goals, fast. USER FORUM Join our community to see why our users are considered some of the most active and helpful in the industry! Have a Specific Question? Get a real answer from a real person Need Support? Get help from our friendly experts. Contact Support Try GAUSS for 14 days for FREE See what GAUSS can do for your data GAUSS Aptech Systems GET IN TOUCH WITH US Email: info@aptech.com Hours of Operation (AZ MST): Monday-Thursday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Friday: 8:00 AM - 3:00 PM Phone: (360) 886-7100 FAX: (360) 886-8922 Address: PO Box 618 Higley, AZ 85236 © Privacy Policy X Thank you for signing up! ×
